sentence.Network_en: There was very little snobbery or class-consciousness in the wartime navy.
sentence.Network_cn: 战时的海军中很少有势利眼，阶级意识也不强。

sentence.Network_en: His wartime exploits were later made into a film.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在战争中的英勇行为后来被改编成一部电影。

sentence.Network_en: His wartime experiences were inexplicably absent from the diaries.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的战时经历莫名其妙地从日记中缺失了。

entry.def: Wartime is a period of time when a war is being fought.

example.ex: The government will commandeer ships only in wartime.
example.tran: 政府只会在战争期间征募船只。

means.word_mean: 1. a period of time during which there is armed conflict
